languages.text: "Я бы не посмел сомневаться в ваших словах, Вольный Торговец, если бы речь шла не о Каллигосе Винтерскейле. Лорд-капитан не мог сговориться с губительными силами — мы вместе преследовали их и искореняли по всему Простору!"

traits.locale_text: "Я бы не посмел сомневаться в ваших словах, Вольный Торговец, если бы речь шла не о Каллигосе Винтерскейле. Лорд-капитан не мог сговориться с губительными силами — мы вместе преследовали их и искореняли по всему Простору!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"
languages.original_text: "Я бы не посмел сомневаться в ваших словах, Вольный Торговец, если бы речь шла не о Каллигосе Винтерскейле. Лорд-капитан не мог сговориться с губительными силами — мы вместе преследовали их и искореняли по всему Простору!"

traits.locale_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « En temps normal, je n'aurais jamais osé mettre votre parole en doute, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais il s'agit de Calligos Winterscale. Il semble impossible que le seigneur-capitaine puisse comploter avec les Puissances de la Ruine, et pour cause : nous les avons pourchassées et éradiquées aux quatre coins des Étendues ! »
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: « En temps normal, je n'aurais jamais osé mettre votre parole en doute, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais il s'agit de Calligos Winterscale. Il semble impossible que le seigneur-capitaine puisse comploter avec les Puissances de la Ruine, et pour cause : nous les avons pourchassées et éradiquées aux quatre coins des Étendues ! »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我不敢怀疑您的话，行商浪人，但我们谈论的人可是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。舰长大人绝不可能与毁灭之力同流合污，我们一直都在整个科罗努斯扩区到处追捕异形，消灭他们！”
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: “我不敢怀疑您的话，行商浪人，但我们谈论的人可是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。舰长大人绝不可能与毁灭之力同流合污，我们一直都在整个科罗努斯扩区到处追捕异形，消灭他们！”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Ich würde nie an Euren Worten zweifeln, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, hätten wir nicht über Calligos Winterzunder gesprochen. Der Lord Captain kann unmöglich mit den Mächten der Zerstörung konspiriert haben — wir haben sie gemeinsam in der gesamten Ausdehnung gejagt und eliminiert!"
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde nie an Euren Worten zweifeln, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, hätten wir nicht über Calligos Winterzunder gesprochen. Der Lord Captain kann unmöglich mit den Mächten der Zerstörung konspiriert haben — wir haben sie gemeinsam in der gesamten Ausdehnung gejagt und eliminiert!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Solo dudo de sus palabras porque estamos hablando de Calligos Winterscale, Comerciante Independiente. No es posible que el Lord Capitán estuviera conspirando con los Poderes Ruinosos, los estábamos persiguiendo y eliminando por toda la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: «Solo dudo de sus palabras porque estamos hablando de Calligos Winterscale, Comerciante Independiente. No es posible que el Lord Capitán estuviera conspirando con los Poderes Ruinosos, los estábamos persiguiendo y eliminando por toda la Extensión».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉を疑うつもりはありません、自由開拓者。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの話を除けば。ロード・キャプテンは禍つ神々と共謀していたわけではないでしょう。私たちは共にエクスパンス全域で戦い、敵を倒していたのです」
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉を疑うつもりはありません、自由開拓者。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの話を除けば。ロード・キャプテンは禍つ神々と共謀していたわけではないでしょう。私たちは共にエクスパンス全域で戦い、敵を倒していたのです」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Hür Tacir Hazretleri, Calligos Winterscale'den bahsediyor olmasaydık sözlerinizden asla şüphe etmezdim. Lord Kaptan, Yıkıcı Güçler'le aynı safı tutmuş olamaz. Birlikte Enginlik'in dört yanını dolaşıp o adilerin hakkından geliyorduk!"
languages.original_text: "I would never doubt your words, Rogue Trader, had we not been talking about Calligos Winterscale. The Lord Captain could not have been conspiring with the Ruinous Powers — we were pursuing and eliminating them together all over the Expanse!"
